Willing to learn and work hard, exceptionally creative, motivate and full 
of fresh and new ideas.
Honest, highly self-discipline, responsible at work, open-minded, 
cooperative and result-oriented.

multicultural knowledge.

Compatible with communication style at international working environment, 
spending years working in EU and Japanese culture company.
Use English as an official language in Project documentation,official mail and

Have appropriate attitude against co-workers as well as line manager
Management skill

decision making, planning, delegation, meeting management.
Manage products by applying Agile project management with Scrum.
Professional skill 
R&D.

and testing compatible.
Maintain habit to  document products features,task and meeting notes.

REMARK 
Weak points 
Strong points

knowledge compared with another competitors.
Feeling eager to moving forward like adapt new 
technology such as new language,new platform.
Proper attitude in communication,never try or show up 
like a boss, in an other hand try to approach and keep 
teamwork and teammate spirit.
Be able to learn skill and experience from colleagues
Keep calmness in most of situation
Some time not decisive enough in my point of view in 
front of my colleague.
Initial complicated setup or configuration of new 
system might slightly discourage me from approaching 
new things.
Balancing between personal interest and career 
development
Getting bored when working on repeating works
Somehow not so good on creating self motivation

Write tech blog based on own experience
THANK FOR YOUR CONCERN!
